description: Two bedroom, one bathroom first floor, newly renovated apartment with open floor plan located close to the intersection of Perryville Rd and Lexington on the north side of Cape Girardeau.  Fresh paint throughout.  Updated kitchen has new counter top, sink, and faucet/sprayer combo.  Enjoy central A/C, baseboard heat, carpeted living room and bedrooms,covered parking, and coin operated washer & dryer located on the first floor of the building.   In the Alma Schrader district. Minimum Deposit $650.00.
